description: Feel the Groove Good Looks, Great Texture Shield your iPod from damage, without sacrificing style. The flexible silicone sleeves feature a unique textured design that looks and feels great. Protection that Fits: The thin, yet durable material is a stylish way to keep your iPod's surface free of scratches and scuffs, without adding extra bulk.
title: Belkin Essential 023 Case for Apple iPod Touch 4th Generation, 2 Pack (Blacktop/Clear)
